scripts.build: cargo build && candid-extractor ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/vetkd_notes_canister.wasm > vetkd_notes_canister.did && ../../didc.sh bind -t js vetkd_notes_canister.did > vetkd_notes_canister.mjs && ../../didc.sh bind -t ts vetkd_notes_canister.did > vetkd_notes_canister.d.ts
scripts.build:release: cargo build --release && candid-extractor ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/vetkd_notes_canister.wasm > vetkd_notes_canister.did && ../../didc.sh bind -t js vetkd_notes_canister.did > vetkd_notes_canister.mjs && ../../didc.sh bind -t ts vetkd_notes_canister.did > vetkd_notes_canister.d.ts
